examples: dotted lines indicate the text's margins
synonyms: stipulate; show "please indicate your preferences on the form"

definitions.definition: be a sign or symptom of; strongly imply.
examples: sales indicate a growing market for such art
synonyms: represent; formalevince; literarybetoken "sales indicate a growing market"

examples: the president indicated his willingness to use force against the rebels
synonyms: disclose; Moreput it on record; admit "the president indicated his willingness to use force"

definitions.definition: (of a person) direct attention to (someone or something) by means of a gesture.
examples: he indicated Cindy with a brief nod of the head
synonyms: gesture toward "he indicated the direction we needed to go"

definitions.definition: (of a gauge or meter) register a reading of (a quantity, dimension, etc.).
suggest as a desirable or necessary course of action.
examples: the treatment is likely to be indicated in severely depressed patients
synonyms: called for "in such cases surgery is indicated"
